snippet: Room and board rates tend to reflect housing quality, but not always.
abstract:
College Board statistics show increase in housing prices for dorm quality that can run gamut; fees are usually based on modernness and conveniences. 
.
lead_paragraph: Room and board rates tend to reflect housing quality, but not always.

headline.main: You Get What You Pay For, Sometimes
headline.print_headline: You Get What You Pay For, Sometimes
